attributes.action: refund the £45 billion pounds that Gordon Brown has taken from pension funds since 1997
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This catastrophic stealth tax has caused severe problems to both company and private individuals retirement prospects. Yet civil servants, MP's included, have guaranteed gold plated pension schemes often subsidised by the tax payers who include those same people that have had their pension funds reduced by this stealth tax.Paying for pensions should be the same for everyone, no one should be penalised for saving for their retirement or subsidised if they don't. 
Paul Wing
